source:
%%sql
-- DBXDH.DHT_PROJECT definition

--drop table etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension;

-- Create Delta Lake table, define schema and location
/*
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension (
    CUSTOMER_KEY INT NOT NULL,
	VERSION INT ,
	CUSTOMER_NO STRING ,
	FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD varchar(10) ,
	GBG_ID varchar(10)  ,
	CUSTOMER_NAME varchar(30)  ,
	CURRENT_IND varchar(1)  ,
	EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	SOURCE_SYSTEM varchar(50)  ,
	REC_CHECKSUM varchar(32)  ,
	REC_STATUS varchar(1)  ,
	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	DATA_IND varchar(10)  ,
	ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND char(1)  
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
-- specify data lake folder location
LOCATION 'abfss://deltalake@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/data/customer'

*/




--rename INTEGER with INT
--replace VARCHAR, CHAR as STRING
--Default is not supported
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ETLHUBCONFIRMED.DHT_PROJECT  (
		  PROJECT_KEY INT NOT NULL , 
		  PROJECT_VERSION INT NOT NULL , 
		  PROJECT_ID STRING  , 
		  FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD STRING , 
		  LEDGER_CD STRING  , 
		  OFFERING_COMPONENT_CD STRING  , 
		  OPPORTUNITY_NUM STRING  , 
		  PROJECT_DESC STRING  , 
		  SIGNINGS_CD STRING  , 
		  SIGNINGS_DESC STRING  , 
		  BUSINESS_TYPE_CD STRING , 
		  BUSINESS_TYPE_DESC STRING , 
		  PROJECT_STATUS_CD STRING  , 
		  PROJECT_STATUS_DESC STRING  , 
		  PROJECT_CUSTOMER_NO STRING   , 
		  PROJECT_CREATION_DATE DATE  , 
		  ACCOUTNING_DIVISION STRING  , 
		  RESPONSIBLE_SERV_OFFICE STRING , 
		  PROJECT_LOCAL_CURRENCY STRING , 
		  LOCAL_ATTRIBUTE07 STRING , 
		  CURRENT_IND STRING  NOT NULL , 
		  EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP  , 
		  REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP  , 
		  REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP  , 
		  SOURCE_SYSTEM STRING  , 
		  REC_CHECKSUM STRING , 
		  REC_STATUS STRING  , 
		  IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP, -- NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS CURRENT TIMESTAMP , 
		  IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP, -- NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS CURRENT TIMESTAMP , 
		  SERVICE_TYPE_CD STRING  , 
		  SERVICE_TYPE_DESC STRING , 
		  RATE_TYPE_CD STRING , 
		  RATE_TYPE_DESC STRING , 
		  CHARGE_CD STRING  , 
		  CHARGE_TO_SERVICE_OFFICE_CD STRING   , 
		  CHARGE_TO_SERVICE_OFFICE_DESC STRING   , 
		  CUSTOMER_PROJECT_DESC STRING  , 
		  DESCRIPTION_CD STRING  , 
		  PROJECT_TITLE STRING , 
		  CUSTOMER_TYPE_CD STRING , 
		  CUSTOMER_TYPE_DESC STRING , 
		  SAP_STATUS_CD STRING , 
		  DATA_IND STRING   , 
		  CONTACT_NM STRING   , 
		  LABOR_CLAIM_IND STRING   , 
		  COMMENT_TEXT STRING   , 
		  BID_AND_PROPOSAL_PROJECT_IND STRING   , 
		  SIGNINGS_EXCEPTION_REASON_CODE STRING , 
		  CHANNEL_INDICATOR STRING,
          ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND STRING  )   
		  USING DELTA
		  PARTITIONED BY (PROJECT_KEY)
		  LOCATION 'abfss://deltalake@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/data/project_dimension'
